title: Cave Dragons Revenge1.2.1.apk
description:
You loved the flappy cave dragons Escape. Now its Time to take revenge.Play Flappy Cave Dragons - Revenge.
Trapped in the cages,kept in dark,ready to be eaten. Grand Dragons the rulers of the dragon valley,the rulers of the sky, capture small dragons and eat them,until one day few of them managed to escape.
Help these dragons get away from their destined death,help them escape the Mystical Caves,Dense Forests and High Valley. Choose between dragons,Use their powers,kill the enemy dragons enslaved by the Grand Dragons.
Take the Dragon Eyes by killing dragons to unlock different worlds and dragons.

Features
--------------
1. Breathtaking Graphics
Experience the adventure in stunning graphics! Witness the dazzling display of each Dragons's unique skills!
2. Collection of Dragons! 
Unlock Dragons from many Dragons with different Attributes of Fire, Water, Acid, Gold, and Shadow!
3. Endless Fun! 
An endless game is much more fun than ending,Fly as far as possible!
4. Two Mode
Unleash your Dragon fury on Survival Mode for Skill test, Play classic for fun!


Get from PLay store :-

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gojazz.dragonsEscape&hl=en" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
